success: text-green-50 border-green-500 bg-green-500/50 hover:bg-green-700 hover:text-green-50 active:bg-green-900
danger: text-red-50 border-red-500 bg-red-500/50 hover:bg-red-700 hover:text-red-50 active:bg-red-900
neutral: text-gray-50 border-gray-500 bg-gray-500/50 hover:bg-gray-700 hover:text-gray-50 active:bg-gray-900
